name: pull-up-flash
author: James Grams <james@game103.net>
description: Click to open flash content on web pages in Flash Player

scripts.build: pkg index.js -c pkg-windows.json -o dist/pull-up-flash-win-standalone.exe && pkg index.js -c pkg-linux.json -o dist/pull-up-flash-linux-standalone && pkg index.js -c pkg-mac.json -o dist/pull-up-flash-macos-standalone && pkg installer.js -c pkg-windows.json -o dist/pull-up-flash-win.exe && pkg installer.js -c pkg-linux.json -o dist/pull-up-flash-linux && pkg installer.js -c pkg-mac.json -o dist/pull-up-flash-macos
